website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight gun rack that will fit in perfectly in any hunting cabin or rustic home.
pros: Lightweight pine frame with deep grooves so guns rest securely
cons: A few users say their guns tend to lean forward at an awkward angle on the rack

customer_reviews.title: Might Look Nice if It Weren’t so Poorly Constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time with packaging intact. Upon opening the box, I immediately noticed damaged cross member. What really bugs me about this issue is that the fabricator knew the material was cracked and attempted to repair the part with glue. This kind of split is not reparable and should have been rejected on the spot. Thanks China...
customer_reviews.author: Henchman21

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fit and finish isn't great, but this isn't expensive. You get what you pay for. The included mounting hardware is trash. Screw heads started stripping immediately and the drywall anchors didn't expand. Basically the whole thing pulled out of the wall and I had to spend some time getting the screws out off the anchors. Ended up replacing them with some others I had laying around. Only got this to hold BB and pellet find in the garage, which it's doing.
customer_reviews.author: nBrix

customer_reviews.title: Buy real wall anchors before you try to install.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic wall anchors are pretty bad, one of them stripped out, the last one I tightened so I was pretty much done. Have to take the whole thing down now as guns are heavy and expensive and now I am paranoid it will fall out of the wall. I am an idiot and was installing the wood screw covers as I went so it's going to be a very annoying fix.
customer_reviews.author: tylertyler

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: A good value. The fit and finish are good. Easy to assemble. Good hardware, including lock washers and plugs for screw holes. Clear, complete instructions. EXCELLENT packaging. Parts individually wrapped PLUS styrofoam PLUS box-in-a-box. Only “negative” (not a biggie) is an odd smell, like moldy alfalfa.
customer_reviews.author: David Van De Voort

customer_reviews.title: Two tries to get one that wasn't cracked.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking wood, but took a return or two to get a set that wasn't cracked. I know it's supposed to be rustic, but the cracks were on the order of making it useless. Refunds and returns no problem though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Now that's a nice big rack
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. The photo's do not do justice to the actual rack. Very nice clear coat finish, and rustic design. For the type of rifles I have on it, it's a match: Civil War musket, Kentucky Long-rifle, Henry Golden Boy. (More than enough space between rifles if you have scopes or magazine wells to consider.) It is held together with threaded sleeves and machine screws (fine thread), plus the hardware to mount it to the wall is included along with wooden dowel plugs to cover mounting holes. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replace the screws and its a good rack
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had with this rack was the screws, pot metal and the head will strip if you try and screw them in anything but plastic. Replace the screws and it's a good rack. They need better screws. Don't try and use these screws in zinc alloy anchors or wood - even if pre-drilled.
customer_reviews.author: t7

customer_reviews.title: I want to keep it for myself
customer_reviews.text: Super inexpensive but looks great! I bought this for my sons room to hold some BB guns and honestly, it was difficult to hand it over and not to put it in my office. You'll need to put it together using a soft touch and or you'll probably split something...so if you can control yourself you'll be just fine. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mazilla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gun rack as gag gift. A throwback to Wayne’s World. She loved it! But I did read the reviews so my cousin can be assured it’s very sturdy. It was very easy to put together. There is a provided tool.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Only works if you want to display rifle upside down
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but is ineffective as it does not allow rifle to sit straight and it sits at an angle downward. Design forces you to place it upside -down in the rack which defeats purpose of displaying it. Also the box was missing hardware and one board was split, which manufacturer claims is normal "checking". I returned as it is not as described
customer_reviews.author: Jill G

customer_reviews.title: A good gun rack but hardware was missing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, and he loved it. However, the hardware was missing and so he can't actually mount it on the wall. This is unfortunate as the wood is beautiful and would look wonderful with the guns. I would gladly rate this product as 5 stars if I was able to get the hardware sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: ALehman45

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice gun rack but the wall mounting hardware was not thought out thoroughly the screws are too big for the drywall mollies second the mollies is themselves are very tiny and cam out really easy and you end up with just holes in your walls.
customer_reviews.author: Desert prince of the Oasis

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value.
customer_reviews.text: A little overpriced for 4 thin boards and 8 bolts. The anchors for two of the bolts were not aligned properly, but it has Phillips screws to adjust. The 4 screws that come with it for mounting bon the wall are inadequate. I used my own larger scews.
customer_reviews.author: Edward B.

customer_reviews.title: amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to put this together is already in the package. It turned out great! Craftsmanship was excellent. Also does have a texturing grip so it doesn't scratch the guns.
customer_reviews.author: reddbubb

customer_reviews.title: It holds up 3 guns.
customer_reviews.text: It was not very substantial. It does hold up 3 rifles but every once in a while I look at it and marvel that they haven’t fallen. When I can afford a new one I’ll get one better built.
customer_reviews.author: Night owl

customer_reviews.title: Great product/value
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and stays on the wall well. Saw a few reviews about others buying their own anchors for the wall, but he was in such a hurry he used the ones they came with and they work great! My only comment is that the firearm must be a long sturdy one. He has a henry golden boy .22 and it does not stay upright without support behind the stock (we're using a piece of foam to keep it up) Other than that, it's great. Will definitely buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G.

customer_reviews.title: Great rack at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This rack is a classic, simple design. Easy to assemble and install. I have 3 shotguns on my rack and it works great. Can’t beat the price and delivery is quick.
customer_reviews.author: mtp

customer_reviews.title: Not the best.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone, upon opening the package I discovered a saw cut in the center of the lower cross brace. If I had more time I’d replace this, alas I’ll begrudgingly give it to it’s intended recipient.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Whats not to like?
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product, well packaged; easy to assemble; very attractive and perfectly functional. Super value at the price -- just bought another one!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hardware / Anchors Not Functional
customer_reviews.text: The screws for securing to the wall are too large and/or the anchors are too small. Had to use own hardware for securing to wall and even drill another hold in center.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to assemble and has a wonderful rustic look.
customer_reviews.text: I love my rifle rack, it matches my interior and was very easy to put together. Thank you for the speedy delivery. I will definitely order from Rush Creek again.
customer_reviews.author: Sherbear

customer_reviews.title: Good quality rack - Recommended
customer_reviews.text: did not work for me bc the wife didnt like them bc not modern enough which is 100% understandable. Great quality and perfect for a rustic cabin look. Not for your luxury modern apartment. I would deff buy this again if i had a cabin in the mountains. A+ even tho i returned.
customer_reviews.author: Koosman09

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, no hardware.
customer_reviews.text: 4 pieces of “wood”. 0 hardware to assemble. I’ve emailed their support. We’ll see how this goes. How hard is it?
customer_reviews.author: Gary J

customer_reviews.title: Useless for Rifles. Hardware is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: The cuts for the rack are too shallow and not tall enough for rifles, especially anything with an optic on it. Nearly impossible for use in that application. Only shotguns and old school (aka straight-type) bolt-action & single shot rifles are able to be put on this rack. Pictures of product show only shotguns for a reason I guess. Also, wall-mounting hardware is crap. Screws strip easily and are entirely too long
customer_reviews.author: Travis Brunson

customer_reviews.title: Great gun rack for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a cheap rack for our deer cabin. This fit the bill perfectly. Probably the nicest thing in the cabin. Very secure and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: zap

customer_reviews.title: Balderdash.
customer_reviews.text: What ever you do don’t buy this. The quality of the item was subpar. The apparent lack of care pre-shipping was abhorrent. The original packaging was destroyed and then taped back together. The item itself had no hardware for assembly, and was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Waza Sunrider

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Super easy to assemble and install, I know 'cause I'm not much of a craftsman myself. Great home addition. It is as nice looking as it is practical.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Adames

customer_reviews.title: Nice little gun rack
customer_reviews.text: Nice little gun rack. We bought it for bb guns. It does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Its OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well made for the money. Issue is none of my guns fit straight in and up as shown in the photos, the slots for the guns are not that big. It is very basic gun rack, nice pine scent. Is what it is if you want a cheap, functional(to a degree) gun rack this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: ET3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of the rack, I believe it is made of pine and it's just BEAUTIFUL! For the price you really cannot go wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This gun rack is an excellent value. It is very sturdy and the cherry finish looks great. Assembly takes just a couple of minutes. It nicely supports my SxS 12ga, Over/Under 12ga, and Semiauto 12ga shotgun.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and matches our bow rack perfectly. Easy to put together and very strong. We like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Rondoodle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Basic Gun Rack
customer_reviews.text: This rack assembles quick with 4 bolts, the nuts are set into the wood making a sturdy rack with no exposed hardware. The light color and dark wood grain looks good on my dark paneling wall. I put a small 6 inch shelf from a crafts store below it and a few old BB guns on it and it looks great on what was an empty wall. It's well worth the cost and prime the shipping was free.
customer_reviews.author: TMA658

customer_reviews.title: Buy the better one
customer_reviews.text: For the positives first It was easy to assemble and it looks nice until you put your rifles on it. It does not hold them properly they look awkwardly displayed like with the slightest bump they will fall
customer_reviews.author: Wingman

customer_reviews.title: Very eye catching
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking piece. Easy install minus the fact the drywall inserts are pretty junky. Easy fix though.
customer_reviews.author: James Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, Wonderful Look
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband's black powder rifles. They look beautiful up on the way in this rack. For the look and price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, came with all the hardware and easy to attach to the wall. Looks good in my bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Penton

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together firearms fit nicely. The only thing I wish was different would be the wood was lighter colored then pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Great Material
customer_reviews.text: This is a no-brained buy. It’s beautiful wood. Easy to hang. Holds 3 rifles. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Burch

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: A very good looking rack with one major problem ! The slots are cut at an angle that rifles will not stand up straight instead of leaning forward. I had to shim each slot to position rifles properly using small wood spacers. Still a nice rack in spite of this design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: allen schlegel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like it, does the job and inexpensive. Looks like the picture and goes together in minutes. It comes with everything to hang it up, you need nothing but a screw driver. I wouldn't call it fancy but it fits in a cabin setting perfectly and is strong enough to hold three heavy guns no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: Simple to assemble and everything lined up perfect. The hardware is 1st class and the embedded ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple to assemble and everything lined up perfect. The hardware is 1st class and the embedded nuts do not turn as so often is the case. Looks great on the wall and the attachments for the wall worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Gun Rack
customer_reviews.text: So pretty!! Very easy to put together and holds our rifles perfectly!! I gave this to my husband for Christmas and he was extremely surprised at the quality and price. We will definitely purchasing more!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Finishes our bedroom and holds our shot gun and sword beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Kathleen Elder

customer_reviews.title: Only holds two standard capacity
customer_reviews.text: Just using it for my sons BB guns and to piss off the xwife. She doesn’t even like water guns. Nice wrack.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey K.

customer_reviews.title: Adds a touch of character
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple no frills piece to hang at hunting cabin,
customer_reviews.author: Harley hunter

customer_reviews.title: Width is not adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: All my rifles hang lower on 1 end because width is not adjustable. Picture depicts 3 shotguns that rest evenly on both sides. Wish that's how my rifles looked.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleF

customer_reviews.title: great gun rack,love the camo pattern
customer_reviews.text: hard to install mounting screws,they kept stripping out. But manufacturers sent parts to install with no problem
customer_reviews.author: michael scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Hardware is garbage and the included screws don’t fit with the included drywall anchors. The biggest issue for me is that a hunting rifle won’t fit if it has a scope mounted though.
customer_reviews.author: Ryland Hancock

customer_reviews.title: BAD JUDGEMENT ON MY PART.
customer_reviews.text: what can i say, I got what I paid for. price was cheap, so is the rack. It will work for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: Good for price. Nice gun rack.
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these gun racks for sons at Christmas. They are just as expected. Nice and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Gun Rack Crooked
customer_reviews.text: It holds my 3 rifles, but it is Crooked, the ones I haver had in the past were straight, I guess in China the make crooked Gun Racks.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brasier

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rack 😉
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture nice rack. The holes for the screws are placed exactly stud length apart so it makes it very easy for mounting.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, fast and easy to put together. Mine holds 2 shotguns and an AR15 with no problem. Only issue i had was it did not work with my lever action unless you leave the action open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bow rack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gun rack to hang my recurve bows. I was a little worried that the bows would not fit after reading some of the reviews on this rack. I will jump on the band wagon with the construction and finish of this product. I love it! It took me 2 minutes to assemble and mount to the wall. It has an awesome rustic finish, I'm glad I chose this gun rack.
customer_reviews.author: Lt.

customer_reviews.title: Too  narrow
customer_reviews.text: The racks are too close together at 20 inches. they need to be at least 24 inches apart.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Red China rubbish
customer_reviews.text: The wall anchor inserts are the worst example of red china crud, totally unusable. Advertising was misleading the product in made in red china not usa.
customer_reviews.author: Ripley

customer_reviews.title: Probably great for most people
customer_reviews.text: Nice price point, I like the wood. My only complaint is the odd angle it holds my firearms. They tend to lead forward and slide back to where my scope it's the rack. It could be that my firearm with a scope is unique. I had to modify the groove to get my gun to fit right.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Finn

customer_reviews.title: firewood
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made, the wood cuts for the grooves where not measured no cut correctly. Had to cut it with a saw for the screw holes to line up. They should pay me for fixing their mess up.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrell Bailey Ii

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Great quality for price. Holds all different sizes and types of firearms. And easily adapted to hold bow from bottom as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together, but had a horrible time trying to find studs to attach to the wall, The directions should of been more clear about how to hang the gun rack, and that the green plastic things would hold the rack if you couldn't find the studs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fun rack that is now Adironda fishing rack
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boy’s room. Easy to put together, sturdy and hold guns nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This was nice product ,easy easy to assemble look nice in my cabin great product for the money got it 3 days early on
customer_reviews.author: riverrat

customer_reviews.title: Nice gun rank
customer_reviews.text: It is simple, very plain, but that's what we wanted, to show guns off not the rack. So this was perfect for our needs. You get to put it together, it didn't take my husband very long at all to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: All I received was three pieces of wood. Nothing to put them together with.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Caldwell Cronic

customer_reviews.title: No hardware
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gun rack, but it did not include ANY assembly hardware!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Walker

customer_reviews.title: Fits m4's and ak
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to build and fits my guns perfect. I have 2 m4 on it and an ak74 and they all fit secure and look beautiful on my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Cris o

customer_reviews.title: Bad design for simple product
customer_reviews.text: Outside of finding it made in China, the openings to hold guns are too big. Guns don't stay upright. I would not recommend buying this product. :(
customer_reviews.author: scott keator

customer_reviews.title: Great looking rife rack
customer_reviews.text: Americana all the way! very well made easy to put together and install on your wall.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. Anstead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product Fits together nice and very easy to assemble Ron Smith WVa
customer_reviews.author: ronald l smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gun rack at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gun rack at an affordable price. Rustic look would have given 5 stars if the rack had felt in place on the ends. Otherwise very hard product to find. I am well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: gun raks works well, but workmanship less than expected
customer_reviews.text: Wood had multiple splinters and cracks were the holes were drilled and the notches cut. One mounting hole was not properly drilled - out of alignment. Easy to fix with my drill. Workmanship was less than I expected But the rack works just fine - as described. But they need to give their workers a course in wood cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Vlach

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gun rack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He loves it although he suggests that the gun holders could be a little wider to hold the guns a little easier. He loves the color of the wood and is really proud of it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Mears

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Not a proper rack both sides are identical guns will not set level.
customer_reviews.author: Kent  Lomon

customer_reviews.title: I am missing all hardware and cannot use my new rack.  Please send hardware for this item to me.
customer_reviews.text: I like the rack but have no hardware and cannot enjoy the product
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Wing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount and it looks great in my cabin!
customer_reviews.author: Army SGT

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Does the job I bought it for with no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Looks very nice in person and will easily hold 3 guns. It's also very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Kouns

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it was made from sticks
customer_reviews.text: Peace s weren't cut the same. Kinda cheap. Guns don't stand up. Looks like it was made from sticks. Overall it was an O.K. for the money.
customer_reviews.author: john p

customer_reviews.title: Love this gun rack
customer_reviews.text: Love this gun rack! Definitely an awesome purchase. Simple to set up and place on the wall and so far it's holding my rifles perfectly. I recommend this product to you!
customer_reviews.author: Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy at a great price point!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, great quality and a super affordable price point! Easily put together and installed. Serves its intended purpose with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: GorioTheGreat

customer_reviews.title: Not a gun rack but it works with a bow
customer_reviews.text: This is poorly designed .the guns do not fit in it properly. Nice wood and look but not very functional. Seller needs to go back and redesigned this piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faded
customer_reviews.text: My problem is the lower strip of wood of paint did not go along with the top It was much more faded than the top strip might have been just me having bad luck getting a bad piece but other than that it is very sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked great. Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend who didn't own a gun just so we could re enact the Waynes world scene. It worked great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Whitten

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking gun rack
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking gun rack. I actually use it for BB rifles and they hang slightly crooked but it is still functional and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to cut and glue felt in the Rifle Cradles/Holders or it Will scratch the finish or bluing.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd E Raynor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gun rack, especially for the price. Easy to assemble, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's made really well and has a beautiful natural wood look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: The construction is pretty solid. The wood itself is light weight but it definitely holds together fine. It works great for what I wanted it for and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this gun rack workout perfect for me great by works perfect
customer_reviews.author: mike L. walker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A Little on the small side but it does the job for my rifles.
customer_reviews.author: Walter W.

customer_reviews.title: If it doesn't make a good rack it made good firewood
customer_reviews.text: Broke into pieces when I hung my first rifle on it. If it doesn't make a good rack it made good firewood.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect, better than expected. medium gloss finish looks great. holds 3 rifles securely
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gun rack!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and looks great! Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs down.
customer_reviews.text: This gun rack looks good but nothing but toy guns would fit on it. It does not come close for a rifle or a shotgun to fit on it. You could put a rifle on the rack, but it would be laying at a 45 degree angle and you can totally forget about a rifle with a scope on it. It is a poor design for regular firearms. I have some short rod and reels and will just use it for that. I am a retired cabinet maker by trade and will just build my on gun rack. Who ever set up this design must of never owned a rifle.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby M Talbert

customer_reviews.title: Well made and shipped promptly. The only draw back ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and shipped promptly. The only draw back is that it is a little too wide for carbine length rifles.
customer_reviews.author: John Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: had too glue some of the wood trim back on.
customer_reviews.author: charles e. fuller

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE Design
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design. Rifles have about a 45 degree forward lean. Do not display well at all! Also, if you have a rifle that is a bit stockier, they don't fit at all. I sent mine back
customer_reviews.author: DocH

customer_reviews.title: but i dont even own a gun
customer_reviews.text: i bought this gun rack as a joke for a friend who is a big fan of waynes world and doesnt own a gun let alone many guns which would necessitate an entire rack. my 30-30 lever action and mossberg shotgun would not sit in the gun rack as pictured. if i could give it 0 stars i would have.
customer_reviews.author: brendan

product_meta.title: Rush Creek Creations Indoor 3 Rifle/Shotgun Wall Storage Display Rack American Cherry Finish
feature_bullets: UNIQUE HUNTING GUN STORAGE: Handcrafted gun wall rack stores and displays up to 3 rifles or shotguns (rifles and guns not included)
GROOVE CHANNELS: Deep groove channels designed to enable guns to rest securely and safely
DURABLE MATERIAL: Solid pine and 4-piece design enhance beauty and durability
RUSTIC STYLE: Checking is the natural drying process that creates splits in the wood for that true rustic look
OFFICIAL RACK SIZE: Rack measures 29.5" L x 3.7" W x 21.5" H; easy to assemble, mounting hardware included
